patches.description: Moved to a typescript code base and implemented an overlay.
changes: Implemented overlay for better user experience.
Introduced Settings section to manage the overlay based on user preference
made the rotation details collapsable so it can be hidden when not being edited
Fixed minor bugs from previous version.
Optimisied the UI to reduce the lag.
Fixed bugs related to overlay rendering.
Updated the main header to be more unique to this app
Fixed a bug with saving rotation names being null
Introduced patch notes feature to keep users informed about updates.
Automatically view patch notes if the sysem detects a new version
